org.cougaar.mts.base
Interface MessageWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageWriterDelegateImplBase, MessageWriterImpl
public interface MessageWriter

This is the final station in the sender for serializling LinkProyocols. MessageWriter and MessageReader allow aspect authors to examine and filter the serialized data stream.

Aspect implementers must either call the package-access addFilter AttribuedMessage method or use pushValue("Filter", className) to get the MessageWriter and MessageReader delegates to be attached. Each message has the aspect chain built for it and the target's aspect chain is governed by the list as given by the sender. Normally the attribute is added in the DestinationLink's forwardMessage or addAttributes method.

The previous stop is DestinationLink. The next stop is MessageReader on the receiving side.

See Also:
AttributedMessage.addFilter(Object), Attributes#pushValue(String, Object), SendLink, SendQueue, Router, DestinationQueue, DestinationLink, MessageReader, MessageDeliverer, Javadoc contributions by George Mount.

          Called after all data is written to the output stream in finishOutput.

preProcess

void preProcess()
Called by AttributedMessage during serialization before getObjectOutputStream and after finalizeAttributes.

See Also:
finalizeAttributes(AttributedMessage), getObjectOutputStream(ObjectOutput)

getObjectOutputStream

java.io.OutputStream getObjectOutputStream(java.io.ObjectOutput out)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
Called by AttributedMessage during serialization. The stream is used to write the serialized message body. The returned OutputStream is usually a filtered stream that modifies the contents before writing them to out.

Parameters:
out - The next innermost stream in the nesting.
Returns:
An OutputStream to be used for serialization of the message.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
preProcess(), finishOutput()

finishOutput

void finishOutput()
                  throws java.io.IOException
Called during AttributedMessage serialization after the message body has been written to the OutputStream returned from getObjectOutputStream.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - The stream could be cached so an IOException can be thrown here.
See Also:
getObjectOutputStream(ObjectOutput)

postProcess

void postProcess()
Called after all data is written to the output stream in finishOutput.
